name: Discerning Gaze
prereq: Vigilante Dedication; Member Of The Gray Gardeners
summary: You have a sense for when people are lying.
description:
You have a sense for when people are lying. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your secret Perception checks to Sense Motive. 
If you use Sense Motive on a creature you have currently condemned with Harsh Judgment, your GM rolls the Perception check twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect).Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
